text: David Trevor Shutt, Baron Shutt of Greetland, (16 March 1942 â€“ 30 October 2020) was a British Liberal Democrat politician. He was Captain of the Yeomen of the Guard and Deputy Chief Whip in the House of Lords between May 2010 and May 2012. Lord Shutt died on 30 October 2020, at the age of 78. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Politicians from Leeds
title: David Shutt, Baron Shutt of Greetland
